description:
Due to the unexpected popularity of her hot spring report, Komugi receives more work much to her delight. As she begins to feel more like an idol, she becomes increasingly excited, but she causes an unbelievable disaster at an old hot spring inn. She overhears Ai saying "Komugi is fired" and is shocked to hear the sudden announcement of her end of employement. However, the vendors at the shopping center are even more shocked than Komugi to learn that she won`t be an idol anymore. Will Komugi reallly be fired from Love Pro?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さようなら, 小麦ちゃん
